response.original_title: Bishop William Swing: San Francisco Foundation Community Leadership Awards 2006
response.overview: Bishop William Swing, winner of the San Francisco Foundation 2006 Community Leadership Awards (The San Francisco Foundation Award) - for creating a more just and compassionate community. He reaches out across religions and takes risks to push for innovative solutions to social problems. Bishop Swing's perseverance in fighting homelessness, raising HIV/AIDS awareness, and providing equal access to healthcare has left an indelible imprint on local, national, and international communities.
response.title: Bishop William Swing: San Francisco Foundation Community Leadership Awards 2006
